Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Oak Park. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Oak Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
